titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on electron guns for certain cathode ray tubes, liquid crystal display panel assemblies for use in liquid crystal display projection type televisions, and plasma display panel assemblies for use in plasma flat panel screen televisions.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 10/29/2003--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2006, the duty on electron guns for certain: (1) cathode ray tubes; (2) liquid crystal display panel assemblies for use in liquid crystal display projection type televisions; and (3) plasma display panel assemblies for use in plasma flat panel screen televisions.
